Metadata.titleHome: TalentLink BiH | Pilot Program to Solve Bosnia’s Labor Shortage
Metadata.descriptionHome: Join TalentLink BiH pilot program to prototype a fully compliant foreign-staffing platform for Bosnian employers—shape the roadmap, give feedback, and secure early access.
Metadata.ogDescriptionHome: Participate in TalentLink BiH pilot program and help prototype a legal foreign-staffing solution addressing Bosnia’s critical labor shortage.
Metadata.titleAbout: TalentLink BiH | Addressing the Labor Shortage in BiH
Metadata.descriptionAbout: Learn about our pilot program co-creating a legal foreign-staffing solution for Bosnian employers. Join us to shape a compliance-first workforce platform.
Metadata.ogDescriptionAbout: Explore our pilot program for legal foreign-staffing in BiH and help co-create an effective workforce solution.
Metadata.titleContact: TalentLink BiH | Get in Touch with Our Pilot Team
Metadata.descriptionContact: Reach out to the TalentLink BiH pilot team to learn how you can join our foreign-staffing prototype, share feedback, or become a founding partner. Let’s work together to solve Bosnia’s labor shortage.
Metadata.ogDescriptionContact: Contact TalentLink BiH pilot team to sign up, ask questions, or explore partnership opportunities in building a compliant foreign-staffing solution for BiH.

HeroSection.title: Rediscover Bosnia: Your Retreat Awaits
HeroSection.subtitle: Experience our beautiful cabin nestled among scenic landscapes.

aboutSection.title: About Our Retreat
aboutSection.body: Nestled in the heart of Una National Park, our hand-crafted cabin welcomes you through all four seasons. In <spring>spring</spring>, wake up to blooming wildflowers and the gentle song of birds; <summer>summer</summer> brings warm days spent kayaking the river and lounging on the deck; <autumn>autumn</autumn> paints the forest in fiery reds and golds perfect for cozy hikes; and <winter>winter</winter> transforms the landscape into a snowy wonderland ideal for skiing and fireside stories. With comfort and style year-round, we offer personalized excursions—canoeing, mountain biking, stargazing dinners—and authentic Bosnian hospitality to make every stay unforgettable.

photosSection.title: Photos of Our Property
photosSection.description: Browse through our hand-picked gallery to see every corner of the cabin—from the welcoming living room and gourmet kitchen to the sun-drenched deck and forested surroundings. Each image captures the unique beauty and comfort you’ll experience during your stay.

videoSection.title: Take a Video Tour
videoSection.description: Step inside and explore every corner of our cozy cabin with this immersive video stroll—see the sunlit living room, the fully equipped kitchen, and the panoramic views that surround you. Press play and let us guide you through the heart of Una National Park from the comfort of your screen.

testimonialSection.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonialSection.description: Join hundreds of happy visitors from across the globe—whether you’re chasing spring blooms or a snowy winter retreat—our Cozy Cabin delivers warm hospitality, breathtaking views, and bespoke local experiences in the heart of Una National Park.

jack.body: I never expected such warmth and hospitality—this cabin truly feels like home.

jill.body: Absolutely magical retreat! Every detail was perfect and the views are stunning.

mahmoud.body: A wonderful escape in nature. The hosts went above and beyond to make us comfortable.

diego.body: From spring blossoms to winter snow, every season here is breathtaking. Highly recommended!

mehmed.body: Cozy, rustic, and so well-appointed—I’ll be coming back every year.

nour.body: Peaceful, picturesque, and full of local charm. An experience I won’t soon forget.

francesca.body: Our family loved the cabin—spacious, spotless, and nestled in absolute serenity.

memoriesSection.title: Make your own memories at our Cozy Cabin!
